github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Always write commit messages in English using the format: <type>: <emoji> <short, imperative message>.
Supported commit types: feat (✨), fix (🐛), config (⚙️), remove (🚮), content (🍱), docs (📝), perf (🐎), refactor (♻️), wip (🚧), a11y (♿️), deps (⬆️), ui (💄), seo (🔍).
Start with a capital letter, do not end with a period, and keep the message around 72 characters max.
Reference issues using the format #<issue_number> when applicable.
Analyze the code changes thoroughly before generating a commit message to ensure accuracy.
Be specific about what changed instead of using generic descriptions.
